properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, USER_ID, COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER ON(NOTICE_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_WRITER ) VALUES ( SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ? )
UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, USER_ID, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER ON(NOTICE_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND N.STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = ?, NOTICE_CONTENT = ? WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
